TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Control extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 表示使用 定義其外觀之使用者介面 (UI) 項目的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class for user interface (UI) elements that use a to define their appearance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是許多您應用程式中加入的控制項的基底類別。The class is the base class for many of the controls you add to an application. 類別會定義很少的行為; 雖然您可以新增您的應用程式通常會更加新增控制項是繼承自，例如或。The class defines very little behavior; while it is possible to add a to your application, it is far more common to add a control that inherits from , such as a or . 屬性，這是，指定的外觀。The property, which is a , specifies the appearance of the . 如果您想要變更控制項的外觀，但保留其功能，您應該考慮建立新而不是建立新的類別。If you want to change the appearance of a control but retain its functionality, you should consider creating a new instead of creating a new class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). 如果您想要建立控制項以自訂行為，以及讓其他人，自訂其外觀，您的控制項可以繼承自類別，並定義。If you want to create a control with custom behavior as well as allow others to customize its appearance, your control can inherit from the class and define a . 如果您想要擴充現有控制項的行為，您可以繼承自類別繼承自。If you want to extend the behavior of an existing control, you can inherit from a class that inherits from . A沒有不是顯示在您的應用程式和設定下列屬性沒有任何作用，除非明確參考它們：A that does not have a is not visible in your application, and setting the following properties has no effect unless the references them explicitly: - - - - - - - - - - 一個常見的方式來使用這些屬性是繫結中的項目屬性。A common way to use these properties is to bind an element in the to the property. 例如，如果您要變更色彩的值根據控制項屬性，您可以繫結中項目的某些屬性至。For example, if you want your control to change color according to the value of the property, you can bind some property of an element in the to the . 使用[TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)若要將屬性繫結控制項中的項目。Use the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md) to bind properties on a control to an element in the . 覆寫的中繼資料屬性，並設定其預設值為`true`。 overrides the metadata of the property and sets its default to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)

param.name: arrangeBounds
param.span: 所計算出用來排列內容的大小。

span.span: The computed size that is used to arrange the content.

summary.span: 呼叫以排列 物件內容，並調整大小。

span.span: Called to arrange and size the content of a object.
The size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設控制項的排列方式排列只的第一個 visual 的子項。The default control arrangement arranges only the first visual child. 未套用轉換。No transforms are applied.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ Background { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };
member this.Background : System.Windows.Media.Brush with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定描述控制項背景的筆刷。

span.span: Gets or sets a brush that describes the background of a control.

value.span: 用來填滿控制項背景的筆刷。

span.span: The brush that is used to fill the background of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性只適用於休止控制項的狀態。The property applies only to the resting state of a control. 控制項的狀態變更時，控制項的預設樣式會指定它的外觀。The default style of the control specifies its appearance when the state of the control changes. 比方說，如果您設定屬性，按鈕在未按下或停用時，才有值。For example, if you set the property on a , the button has that value only when it is not pressed or disabled. 如果您想要建立具有更進階的背景自訂控制項，您必須定義控制項的樣式。If you want to create a control that has a more advanced customization of the background, you must define the control's style. 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項屬性做為參數。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的背景屬性。The following example shows how to set the background property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#11)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#1)] 下列範例顯示範本，可讓觸發程序時按下變更按鈕的背景。The following example shows a template that enables a trigger to change the background of a button when it is pressed. [!code-xaml[BackgroundProp_snip#ButtonTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BackgroundProp_snip/CS/page1.xaml#buttontemplate)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDoubleClick As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按兩下或更多下滑鼠按鈕時。

span.span: Occurs when a mouse button is clicked two or more times.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然此路由的事件，看起來進行反昇路由處理項目樹狀結構，但實際上是直接的路由的事件引發沿著項目樹狀結構的每個。Although this routed event seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each . 如果您設定屬性`true`中事件處理常式，後續路由上的事件會發生與設`false`。If you set the property to `true` in a event handler, subsequent events along the route will occur with set to `false`. 這是較高層級的事件，控制項取用者想要在使用者按兩下控制項時收到通知，並處理應用程式中的事件。This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application. 應該使用控制項作者都想要處理滑鼠點按動作 double事件時等於兩個。Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the event when is equal to two. 這會導致狀態項目樹狀結構中的另一個項目會處理事件的案例中適當地傳播。This will cause the state of to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event. 類別會定義和事件，但沒有對應的按一下事件。The class defines the and events, but not corresponding single-click events. 如果使用者已按一下控制項一次，請處理事件 （或其對應項目），並檢查是否屬性值為 1。To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the property value is 1. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何附加至事件處理常式事件。The following example shows how to attach an event handler to the event. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#controlevents11)] 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows the event handler of the event. [!code-csharp[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#controlevents1)] [!code-vb[ControlProps_snip#ControlEvents1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#controlevents1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項引發藉由呼叫事件方法。The control raises the event by calling the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnTemplateChanged (System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate oldTemplate, System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate newTemplate);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateChanged(class System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate oldTemplate, class System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate newTemplate) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnTemplateChanged (oldTemplate As ControlTemplate, newTemplate As ControlTemplate)

abstract member OnTemplateChanged : System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate * System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate -> unit override this.OnTemplateChanged : System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate * System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate -> unit

span.span: The old template.
The new template.

summary.span: 每當控制項的範本變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called whenever the control's template changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更範本的時間如下：The timing for changing the template is as follows: 1. 變更範本方法呼叫、 樣式的觸發程序或其他方式。The template is changed by a method call, a style trigger, or some other means. 2. 變更屬性值。屬性變更會呼叫回呼。The property value changes; the property-changed callback is called. 3. 會移除舊的視覺化樹狀結構。The old visual tree is removed. 4. 內部的方法會呼叫最後呼叫方法。An internal method is called which eventually calls the method. 5. 更新期間，與量值呼叫，並會附加新的視覺化樹狀結構。Later, during a measure, is called and a new visual tree is attached.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness Padding { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };
member this.Padding : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項內部的邊框間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding inside a control.

value.span: 的內容及其 或 之間的間距數。

span.span: The amount of space between the content of a and its or .
The default is a thickness of 0 on all four sides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 填補指定左順序、 頂端、 右側，和下方。Padding is specified in the order Left, Top, Right, and Bottom. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[對齊、 邊界和邊框距離概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。For more information, see and [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md). 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項屬性做為參數。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的邊框間距屬性。The following example shows how to set the padding property of a control. [!code-xaml[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#additionalcontrolprops13)] [!code-csharp[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#additionalcontrolprops3)] [!code-vb[ControlProps_snip#AdditionalControlProps3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlProps_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#additionalcontrolprops3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然此路由的事件，看起來要遵循的通道路由處理項目樹狀結構，但實際上是直接的路由的事件引發沿著項目樹狀結構的每個。Although this routed event seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each . 如果您設定屬性`true`中事件處理常式，後續路由上的事件會發生與設為`false`，但事件就會發生與設`true`。If you set the property to `true` in a event handler, subsequent events along the route will occur with set to `false`, but the event will occur with set to `true`. 這是較高層級的事件，控制項取用者想要在使用者按兩下控制項時收到通知，並處理應用程式中的事件。This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application. 應該使用控制項作者都想要處理滑鼠點按動作 double事件時等於兩個。Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the event when is equal to two. 這會導致狀態項目樹狀結構中的另一個項目會處理事件的案例中適當地傳播。This will cause the state of to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event. 類別會定義和事件，但沒有對應的按一下事件。The class defines the and events, but not corresponding single-click events. 如果使用者已按一下控制項一次，請處理事件 （或其對應項目），並檢查是否屬性值為 1。To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the property value is 1. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將事件處理常式附加事件。The following example shows how to attach an event handler the event. summary.span: 取得或設定值，此值會決定當使用者使用 TAB 鍵巡覽控制項時，項目接收焦點的順序。

value.span: 決定裝置邏輯巡覽順序的值。

span.span: A value that determines the order of logical navigation for a device.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有較低的索引標籤索引控制項取得焦點的索引較高的控制項之前。A control with a lower tab index receives focus before a control with a higher index. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會設定三個按鈕的定位點索引。The following example sets the tab index of three buttons. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::ControlTemplate ^ Template { System::Windows::Controls::ControlTemplate ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::ControlTemplate ^ value); };
member this.Template : System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項範本。

span.span: Gets or sets a control template.
The template that defines the appearance of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定外觀; 如果沒有、不會出現在您的應用程式。The specifies the appearance of a ; if a does not have a , the will not appear in your application. 控制作者定義的預設控制項範本，而且應用程式作者可以覆寫重新定義控制項的視覺化樹狀結構。The control author defines the default control template, and the application author can override the to redefine the visual tree of the control. 請參閱[控制項樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)資訊及如何變更現有控制項的視覺化樹狀結構的範例。See [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md) for information and examples of how to change the visual tree of existing controls. A將不可見的外部使用者和物件，包括實作詳細資料的自主的單位物件。A is intended to be a self-contained unit of implementation detail that is invisible to outside users and objects, including objects. 唯一的方式來操作控制項範本的內容會從位於相同的控制項範本。The only way to manipulate the content of the control template is from within the same control template. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會建立如。The following example creates a for a . 如果您的加入您為資源的應用程式，應用程式中的所有按鈕會顯示為省略符號，但仍會以按鈕的函式。If you add this to your application as a resource, all the buttons in the application will appear as ellipses but will still function as buttons. [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)]

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了， ，和，您可以設定屬性，這會自動縮放以填滿父項目的配置空間的子項目。In addition to , , and , you can set the property to , which stretches the child element to fill the allocated layout space of the parent element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[對齊、 邊界和邊框距離概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md). 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項屬性做為參數。This property only affects a control whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。On other controls, this property has no impact. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何在控制項上設定內容的垂直對齊屬性。The following example shows how to set the vertical content alignment property on a control.
